sentences.english: He became sad and angry when he saw pictures of hungry people in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 当他看到非洲饥民的画面时，他悲愤交加。

sentences.english: At the news of her husband's death she took on like a mad woman.
sentences.chinese: 接到丈夫逝世的消息，她悲愤得疯了似的。

sentences.english: He filled with sorrow and anger into poetry, the spread of the Miluo river.
sentences.chinese: 他把满腔悲愤化为诗歌，蔓延在汩罗江上。

sentences.english: Filled with anger and grief he draws his sword against the dog.
sentences.chinese: 在愤怒和悲愤下，他拔剑杀死了狗。

sentences.english: Neither is stimulus of old factories or yelling in frustration and anger.
sentences.chinese: 陈旧工厂的激怒或是沮丧与悲愤中的呼号也不能。

sentences.english: Neither will I hide my bitter feelings nor will I exaggerate my grief and indignation .
sentences.chinese: 我不掩饰我内心的苦涩，也不虚张我的悲愤。

sentences.english: His heart ached with anger and sorrow.
Lin Wu Yang aside to see their two loved ones die, indignation abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 林午阳在一旁看到自己两个亲人离去，悲愤异常。

sentences.english: Dr. Warner was shot by a grieving mother.
sentences.chinese: Warner医生则被一位悲愤的母亲射杀了。

sentences.english: There she collects the force of female lungs, sighs sobs and passions.
sentences.chinese: 她极尽女性之能事，长呼短叹，泣不成声，悲愤不已。

definition: variant of 憤恨|愤恨[fen4 hen4]
